TopicTitle: [1.12.x] Extra Docking Ports - Docking Ports with Parachute Attachment Points and 1.875m Docking Port (Version 1.3.0 - Bug fixes)

Articles.Content:
Extra Docking Ports

Download via CKAN

Manual Install:  Download from GitHub

Need to have both a parachute and a docking port on your vessel, but don't want to resort to gluing radial parachutes on the side of your capsule? Want to connect two 1.875m wide parts together without an awkward narrow passage? With this small part mod, you can. It introduces a modular docking port and parachute system for the 0.625 meter wide and 1.25m wide sizes. It also adds a 1.875m Vanilla/ReStock style docking port, something that I'm surprised no one else seems to have done yet, at least to my knowledge.

Due to some technical and aesthetical limitations, the parachute and docking port are separate parts, with three custom parachute modules snapping into the new modular docking port parts with 3-way radial symmetry to provide an integrated and streamlined parachute and docking port system. You can find all the docking ports in the Coupling subcategory, and the parachutes in the Utility subcategory.

No mods are required, but ReStock is highly recommended, since the docking ports were designed to seamlessly connect with the revamped ReStock docking ports.

Please let me know if you run into any issues while using this mod. I try to test things thoroughly, but it can be easy to miss things, so feedback is greatly appreciated.

Here's a link to some screenshots demonstrating the 1.25m modular docking port and modular parachute in action

Spoiler

1.30 - Added bug fixes for VAB, increased parachute drag values and lowered deployment altitudes, moved parachutes to the Utility category, and added CLS support thanks to Grimmas.

1.2.0 - Added a new 1.25m compact docking port. Fixed a typo that made the 1.25m modular docking port connect with 0.625 ports instead of 1.25m ports.

1.1.1 - Fixed missing mipmaps in some textures.

1.1.0 - Added new white texture variants and improved textures slightly.

1.0.3 - Updated parachute part values to be more consistent with stock.

1.0.2 - Updated part costs and packed values to be consistent with stock. Added values that I forgot to change from the default for the medium docking port. Adjusted the medium docking port joint type to LOCKED_JOINT for (hopefully) less jitter when rotating attached parts while on the ground.

1.0.1 - Adjusted parachute node sizes to match modular docking port radial node sizes.

1.0.0 - Initial Release
